title: Sampler, 1759
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, wool foundation
Technique: cross, long-armed cross, double running, rococo, and chain stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Four cross borders with floral ornament and "boxers"; The Lord's Prayer; alphabets, numerals and date.

tombstone.epitaph:

1759. Medium: silk embroidery, wool foundation
